entries.title: Beach Cleanup Drive at Juhu
entries.summary: Join us for a morning beach cleanup at Juhu Beach. Help remove plastic waste and debris to protect marine life.
entries.description:
Every weekend, tons of plastic waste washes up on Mumbai's beaches. Join our volunteer team for a 3-hour cleanup drive at Juhu Beach. We'll provide gloves, bags, and refreshments. Together, we can make a difference for our oceans and marine life.

What to expect:
- Safety briefing and waste segregation training
- Cleanup activity in groups
- Photo documentation of impact
- Certificate of participation
entries.address: Juhu Beach, near Prithvi Theatre, Juhu, Mumbai 400049
entries.requirements: Wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can get wet. Bring sunscreen and a water bottle.

entries.title: Teaching English to Underprivileged Children
entries.summary: Volunteer as an English teacher for children in Dharavi. Make a lasting impact through education.
entries.description:
Help children from low-income families learn English communication skills. Our learning center in Dharavi needs passionate volunteers to teach basic English conversation, reading, and writing to children aged 8-14.

No teaching experience required - just enthusiasm and patience! We provide teaching materials and a structured curriculum. Sessions are held on weekends, and you can commit to as few as 2 sessions per month.
entries.address: Hope Learning Center, 60 Feet Road, Dharavi, Mumbai 400017
entries.requirements: Fluent English speaker. Background check required for working with children.

entries.title: Blood Donation Camp
entries.summary: Donate blood and save lives. One donation can save up to 3 lives!
entries.description:
In partnership with the Red Cross, we're organizing a blood donation camp at our office premises. Blood banks are running low, and your donation can make a critical difference.

The process takes only 30-45 minutes including registration and rest time. Light refreshments will be provided after donation. All donors will receive a health checkup certificate.
entries.address: WeWork Galaxy, Residency Road, Ashok Nagar, Bangalore 560025
entries.requirements: Age 18-65, weight above 50kg, no major health conditions. Carry a valid ID.

entries.title: Animal Shelter Volunteering
entries.summary: Spend time with rescued animals at our shelter. Help with feeding, grooming, and socialization.
entries.description:
PAWS Animal Shelter rescues stray and abandoned animals in Pune. We need volunteers to help care for our 150+ resident dogs and cats.

Activities include:
- Feeding and water bowl cleaning
- Walking dogs and playtime
- Basic grooming assistance
- Helping with adoption events
- Administrative tasks

This is a great opportunity for animal lovers to make a direct impact. Training will be provided on your first visit.
entries.address: PAWS Shelter, Survey No. 45, Near Bhugaon Lake, Pune 411042
entries.requirements: Comfortable around animals. Tetanus vaccination recommended.

entries.title: Tree Plantation Drive
entries.summary: Plant trees and help combat air pollution in Delhi NCR. Join us for a green initiative!
entries.description:
Delhi's air quality crisis needs urgent action. Join our tree plantation drive where we'll plant 1000 native trees in collaboration with the Delhi Forest Department.

Each volunteer will plant 5-10 saplings and learn about native species that are best suited for Delhi's climate. Saplings, tools, and refreshments will be provided.

Post-plantation, volunteers can 'adopt' their trees and track their growth through our app.
entries.address: Biodiversity Park, Near Vasant Kunj, New Delhi 110070
entries.requirements: Wear full-sleeved clothes and closed shoes. Bring gloves if you have.

entries.title: Free Health Checkup Camp
entries.summary: Volunteer doctors and nurses needed for a free health camp in rural Chennai.
entries.description:
We're organizing a free health checkup camp for villagers in the outskirts of Chennai who have limited access to healthcare. We need medical professionals to volunteer their time.

Services offered:
- General health checkup
- Blood pressure and sugar testing
- Eye examination
- Dental checkup
- Basic medicines distribution

Non-medical volunteers are also welcome for registration, crowd management, and logistics.
entries.address: Government School, Thiruporur Village, Chengalpattu District, Tamil Nadu
entries.requirements: Medical professionals must bring valid license. All volunteers must carry ID proof.

entries.title: Online Mentorship for College Students
entries.summary: Mentor first-generation college students online. Share your career experience and guidance.
entries.description:
Many first-generation college students lack access to career guidance and mentorship. Our virtual mentorship program connects experienced professionals with students from rural and semi-urban colleges.

As a mentor, you'll:
- Have 2-4 video calls per month with your mentee
- Guide them on career choices, skill development, and interview preparation
- Share industry insights and networking opportunities

Commitment: 3-6 months, 2-3 hours per week.
All sessions are conducted online via video calls.
entries.requirements: 5+ years of work experience. Reliable internet connection for video calls.

entries.title: Food Distribution Drive for Homeless
entries.summary: Help distribute meals to homeless individuals in Hyderabad. Every meal matters!
entries.description:
Every Sunday evening, we distribute freshly cooked meals to homeless individuals across various spots in Hyderabad. Join our team of volunteers who help with meal preparation, packing, and distribution.

We serve approximately 300 meals each Sunday. Volunteers can help with:
- Morning shift: Cooking and packing (9 AM - 12 PM)
- Evening shift: Distribution drive (6 PM - 9 PM)

Vehicles are provided for the distribution route.
entries.address: Community Kitchen, Banjara Hills Road No. 12, Hyderabad 500034
entries.requirements: No specific requirements. Enthusiasm to serve is all you need!

entries.title: Coastal Cleanup and Marine Conservation Workshop
entries.summary: Clean Goa's beaches and learn about marine conservation from experts.
entries.description:
Join us for a full-day coastal cleanup event followed by an interactive workshop on marine conservation. This event combines hands-on environmental action with education about ocean ecosystems.

Schedule:
- 7:00 AM: Beach cleanup at Calangute
- 10:30 AM: Breakfast break
- 11:00 AM: Marine biology workshop with experts
- 1:00 PM: Lunch and networking

All materials, meals, and transportation from Panjim are included.
entries.requirements: Wear comfortable beachwear. Sunscreen and hat recommended.

entries.title: Stray Dog Vaccination Drive
entries.summary: Help catch and vaccinate stray dogs in Jaipur to prevent rabies spread.
entries.description:
Rabies is 100% preventable through vaccination. Our team conducts monthly drives to vaccinate stray dogs in different areas of Jaipur. We need volunteers to assist veterinarians in catching, holding, and documenting vaccinated dogs.

Training will be provided on-site for safe animal handling. This is a physically demanding but extremely rewarding volunteer opportunity.
entries.address: Various locations - Meeting point: Animal Aid Unlimited, Badi, Udaipur Road
entries.requirements: Must be comfortable around dogs. Tetanus and anti-rabies vaccination recommended.

entries.title: Rural School Library Setup
entries.summary: Help set up a library in a rural school. Sort books, create catalog, and design reading space.
entries.description:
We've collected over 2000 books for a government school in rural Karnataka. We need volunteers to help transform an empty classroom into a functional library.

Activities:
- Sorting and cataloging books by age group and subject
- Setting up shelves and seating
- Creating a lending system
- Decorating the space to make it inviting for kids
- Training student librarians

This is a two-day event with accommodation provided.
entries.address: Government Higher Primary School, Srirangapatna, Mysore District
entries.requirements: Two-day commitment required. Transportation from Bangalore provided.

entries.title: Senior Citizen Companionship Program
entries.summary: Spend quality time with elderly residents at old age homes. Combat loneliness through connection.
entries.description:
Many elderly residents in old age homes feel lonely and isolated. Our companionship program matches volunteers with seniors for regular visits.

As a volunteer, you can:
- Have conversations and listen to their stories
- Play games like chess, carrom, or cards
- Help them with technology (phones, video calls)
- Read newspapers or books to them
- Simply be a friend

Commit to at least 2 visits per month for 3 months.
entries.address: Multiple partner old age homes across Kolkata
entries.requirements: Patience and empathy. Bengali speaking preferred but not mandatory.

entries.title: Plastic-Free Campus Workshop
entries.summary: Conduct workshops on reducing plastic waste in college campuses. Train student ambassadors.
entries.description:
Be a part of our movement to make Gujarat's colleges plastic-free! We're looking for passionate volunteers to conduct interactive workshops in colleges across Ahmedabad.

The workshop covers:
- Impact of plastic pollution
- Practical alternatives to single-use plastic
- How to organize a campus cleanup
- Setting up recycling systems

We'll train you on the workshop content and provide all materials. Each workshop is 2 hours long.
entries.address: Various colleges in Ahmedabad - Schedule provided after registration
entries.requirements: Good presentation skills. Training provided on content.

entries.title: Wildlife Census Volunteer
entries.summary: Assist forest officials in annual wildlife census at Jim Corbett National Park.
entries.description:
Join the annual wildlife census at Jim Corbett National Park! This is a unique opportunity to contribute to conservation while experiencing India's oldest national park.

Volunteers will:
- Assist forest rangers in counting wildlife
- Record animal sightings and tracks
- Help with camera trap data collection
- Learn wildlife identification skills

This is a 4-day immersive experience with accommodation in forest rest houses. Limited spots available.
entries.address: Jim Corbett National Park, Ramnagar, Uttarakhand 244715
entries.requirements: Good physical fitness for jungle walks. Photography skills helpful. 4-day commitment required.

entries.title: Digital Literacy for Rural Women
entries.summary: Teach basic smartphone and internet skills to rural women online. Empower through technology.
entries.description:
Many rural women have access to smartphones but lack the skills to use them effectively. Our virtual program teaches basic digital literacy through regional language video calls.

Curriculum includes:
- Using WhatsApp for communication
- Accessing government schemes online
- Digital payments (UPI)
- Staying safe online
- Using YouTube for learning

Each volunteer is matched with 3-5 learners for weekly 1-hour sessions over 2 months.
entries.requirements: Fluency in Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, or Telugu. Patience and basic tech skills.

entries.title: Emergency Flood Relief Volunteers
entries.summary: Join our rapid response team for flood relief operations in Assam.
entries.description:
Assam faces devastating floods every monsoon. We're building a team of volunteers who can be deployed for relief operations on short notice (24-48 hours).

Activities include:
- Distribution of relief materials
- Setting up temporary shelters
- Cooking and serving food
- Medical first aid assistance
- Rescue boat operations (trained volunteers only)

Training workshop mandatory before deployment. Travel and accommodation covered during deployment.
entries.address: Deployment locations vary - Base camp in Guwahati
entries.requirements: Physical fitness. Ability to take leave on short notice. Training workshop attendance required.

entries.title: Teach Coding to School Students
entries.summary: Volunteer as an online coding instructor for underprivileged school students.
entries.description:
Help bridge the digital divide by teaching basic programming to students from government schools. Our online program introduces students to computational thinking and Scratch programming.

No prior teaching experience needed - we provide:
- Complete curriculum and lesson plans
- Training on online teaching tools
- Student group assignment
- Technical support

Teach one 1-hour session per week for 3 months. Make technology accessible to all!
entries.requirements: Basic programming knowledge (any language). Laptop with stable internet.

entries.title: Community Garden Development
entries.summary: Help develop an urban community garden in Kochi. Grow food, grow community!
entries.description:
Transform a vacant lot in Fort Kochi into a thriving community garden! This project aims to create a sustainable urban farming space where locals can grow organic vegetables.

Phase 1 activities (this month):
- Clearing and preparing the land
- Building raised garden beds
- Setting up composting systems
- Installing rainwater harvesting
- Initial planting

Ongoing volunteers needed for maintenance after setup.
entries.address: Near St. Francis Church, Fort Kochi, Kochi 682001
entries.requirements: Gardening experience helpful but not required. Physical work involved.

entries.title: Pet Adoption Fair Support
entries.summary: Help organize and run a pet adoption fair in Mumbai. Find forever homes for rescued animals!
entries.description:
Our quarterly pet adoption fair is the biggest in Mumbai, helping 50+ animals find loving homes each time. We need enthusiastic volunteers for various roles:

- Registration desk
- Animal handling (trained volunteers)
- Crowd management
- Photography and social media
- Adoption counseling
- Setup and cleanup

Volunteer for one or both days. This is a heartwarming experience seeing animals meet their new families!
entries.requirements: Love for animals! Specific role requirements will be shared after registration.

entries.title: River Rejuvenation Project
entries.summary: Join the movement to clean and rejuvenate local rivers in Varanasi.
entries.description:
The Ganga and its tributaries need our help. Join our monthly river rejuvenation drives in Varanasi where we:

- Remove solid waste from river banks
- Clear invasive water plants
- Plant native trees along the banks
- Conduct water quality testing
- Engage with local communities on river conservation

This is a long-term initiative. Commit to at least 3 monthly drives.
entries.requirements: Early morning availability on second Sunday of each month. Swimming skills preferred but not required.
